title: Not able to connect to pvp.net
body: Is anyone else having an issue? Everytime I try to log in I get a message saying that I failed to connect to PvP.net. I've used Riots repair thing and allowed it to take control of my firewall to allow aces, repatched ect. but I still can't get on. If I go to the new client it just never ending authenticating.

replies.body: Repairs are solid for corrupt game files, but not necessarily for resolving connection issues.  In this case it sounds like your network is having problems connecting to the login servers.  I'm investigating reports of this in another thread, and I'd like your help as well.  If you are still having this issue, go through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to see if tuning up your network might help.  Let me know!
I went through the connection issues multiple times but nothing seemed to fix it. I'm able to play any other game perfectly fine though. How I wish this would be fixed in a {{summoner:4}}  xD

If the connection issues guide wasn't able to fix this up, our tech team can help through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain some logs and attach it to your ticket.  We'll help you individually to find out what's going on!
